title: How Many Calories in 1 Cup of Sugar?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in 1 cup of sugar, including full nutrition breakdown, carbs, sugars, and easy tweaks for recipes.
h1: How Many Calories in 1 Cup of Sugar?
assumptions: Granulated white sugar; 1 cup ≈ 200 g (standard US measuring cup, not packed).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, brand, granularity, and packing method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of granulated sugar provides about 774 calories, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in 1 cup of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 774 calories for 1 cup granulated white sugar.

faqs.q: Is all of the calories in sugar from carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 100% from carbohydrates, with 200 g total carbs and sugars per cup.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 cup?
faqs.a: About 200 g of granulated sugar, equivalent to roughly 50 teaspoons.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Similar—light brown has about 760 kcal per cup, slightly less due to minor moisture.

faqs.q: What about powdered sugar calories per cup?
faqs.a: Lower density means ~464 kcal per cup, as it's about 120 g.
